description: Enterprise techniques used by Pasam, ATT&CK software S0208 (v1.1)
name: Pasam (S0208)

techniques.comment: [Pasam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0208) establishes by infecting the Security Accounts Manager (SAM) DLL to load a malicious DLL dropped to disk.(Citation: Symantec Pasam May 2012)
[Pasam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0208) creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can retrieve files.(Citation: Symantec Pasam May 2012)
[Pasam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0208) creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can retrieve lists of files.(Citation: Symantec Pasam May 2012)
[Pasam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0208) creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can delete files.(Citation: Symantec Pasam May 2012)
[Pasam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0208) creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can upload files.(Citation: Symantec Pasam May 2012)
[Pasam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0208) creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can retrieve lists of running processes.(Citation: Symantec Pasam May 2012)
[Pasam](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0208) creates a backdoor through which remote attackers can retrieve information such as hostname and free disk space.(Citation: Symantec Pasam May 2012)
